resources:
MoneyManagerEx
Money Manager Ex A simple and easy-to-use application to manage personal finances, bank accounts, family budget, and so on. MoneyManagerEx for Android Project uses ActionBarSherlock library Open source licenses

MoneyManagerEx for Android is provided for free. If you like the application, you can support the development team with a donation. Google Play In-App Billing Donate via Google Play In-App Billing. Select a donation amount Donate Thank you for your donation! Donate No, thanks Donate! You can donate directly by clicking the Donate links on our app web page. We also accept BitCoin donations. For Google licensing reasons, we are not allowed to place donation links directly inside the app. Donate Open homepage

Don\'t show again Open Database Synchronization Interval How often should synchronize?
As of version 1.2.0, Money Manager Ex for Android has changed the Dropbox synchronization engine. The users who are already using the Dropbox sync need to update the configuration.\nThe authentication and the selection of the database is located in the Settings.\nAs of version 1.2.0, Money Manager Ex for Android can automatically synchronize the database.
Shows the balance for each transaction Shows the balance for each transaction. The display of balance could make the application slower Open database Database--> Tips Application Font Select the font you want to give the application Application Font Size Select the font size you want to give the application Micro Small Default Medium Large

All transactions in MoneyManagerEx belong to accounts.\n\nYou currently have no visible accounts. Either adjust the filter for visible accounts in the Settings, or select one of the options below. Keep editing Discard Invalid expression Logcat Due Today Issue Tracker on GitHub Settings Close Multiple account types: checking, savings, credit, assets, and investments. Swipe left to continue… Financial Overview Quick overview dashboard, budgets, reports with customizations. Global Multiple currencies and languages. Open Source. Join our translation team. Support for multiple platforms, synchronization via multiple cloud services. Import and export of your data to other applications. Transactions Deposits, withdrawals, transfers. Recurring transactions with reminders. -Split Category- Currency Exchange Rate Chart Sort by year and month ascending Sort by year and month descending Years Select the years to be displayed To Date From Date Custom Dates Hide the reconciled amounts from the accounts on dashboard. There is an update of the database on Dropbox Your database has been downloaded To use the database downloaded, touch Open Database Touch to select the file to use from Dropbox Download from Dropbox Touch to manually download the linked file from Dropbox folder Upload to Dropbox Touch to manually upload the linked file to Dropbox folder How does Dropbox work for Money Manager Ex\? Link to Dropbox Unlink from Dropbox Downloading file from Dropbox. Please wait… Uploading file to Dropbox. Please wait… Dropbox File File anywhere in Dropbox Your current database is not synchronized. Please set up Dropbox synchronization.
Synchronization Sync enabled Provider Remote file Please wait This extension is not recognised as a valid database. Reset preferences Synchronization preferences have been reset. Download database file from the cloud storage. Upload database file to the cloud storage. Money Manager Ex - Sync Downloading database. Please wait… Uploading database. Please wait… Synchronizing file. Please wait… The database is up to date Your database has been successfully uploaded Every 5 minutes Every 10 minutes Every 15 minutes Every 30 minutes Every hour Every 2 hours Every 3 hours Every 6 hours Every 12 hours Never Checking remote storage for database modifications. Upload the database immediately after change This option allows to automatically upload as soon as you change the database The folder in Dropbox/Apps/Money Manager Ex Android is empty. If you already use MoneyManagerEx copy your database to this folder in your computer, and after you do the refresh. Select a remote file from the cloud storage Do you want to download the remote file now? File exists A file with the same name already exists in the local storage. Do you want to overwrite this file? Synchronization is disabled. The remote and local filenames differ. Aborting synchronization. Both the local and the remote database files have been modified! Sync conflict Please select the remote file to use for synchronization.
There are no accounts available for selection. Please adjust your preferences for account filtering or mark some accounts as favourite.
Error parsing entered value Remote file not found Error checking for remote changes. The remote change date not found in the metadata.
To start using Money Manager Ex, you need to have a database file to store your data. Please select one of the available options below. You can create a new file and set up the initial preferences. Or you can select an existing file from your device. Alternatively, you can set up the synchronisation with a cloud service and download your database file from online storage for start.
Select language Run Money Manager Ex The default database location is:
